Contact us incase you have any issues by email or by phone at +237 663 60 60 60. More can be found on our official website by clicking on the link below.
Hi there! I’d like to introduce you to Ub Attendance - a simple and cost-effective solution for your daily transactions via local mobile payments. Join me and start building your profile. Oh, and did I mention we’ll both get a XAF5000 reward!
Thanks for stopping by our app. We have other apps that are eye catching you could download from the android market. Or better still visit our website by clicking on the link below
UB Attendance is a mobile application that wants to democratize mobile payments by bringing traditional payment methods of debit and credit cards with ease of mobile money. More can be found on our official website by clicking on the link below.
